coreAttributes.authorTag: Underneath the receiver, a small engraving reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Forgeworks."
coreAttributes.name: teargas shotgun
coreAttributes.description: A huge 4-gauge shotgun loaded with teargas grenades. Although it bears Enforcer markings, they have been scratched out and replaced with insignia you don't recognize.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] out the shotgun, [npc.verb(load)] it, [npc.verb(move)] the fore end forward with an intimidating clack before disengaging the safety.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(move)] the foreend back and [npc.verb(check)] to see that the chamber is empty before putting the shotgun away.
coreAttributes.onCriticalHitEffect: #IF (!npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_POISON_VAPOURS_CHOKING_HAZE)) [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_POISON_VAPOURS_CHOKING_HAZE , 4)] There is now a [style.boldPoison(very thick haze of teargas)] around [npc2.name]. #ENDIF

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(line)] up [npc2.name] in [npc.her] sights and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger at [npc2.name]. The grenade flies in a gracefull arc and lands by [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet], [style.boldPoison(releasing a choking cloud of tear gas.)]

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(line)] up [npc2.name] in [npc.her] sights and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger at [npc2.name]. The grenade misses [npc2.herHim] completely and lands in the distance.
